mod.name: Potionbrewer
mod.description:
Adds the Potionbrewer.
        - Includes 16 new potions
        - Catalyze mechanic (power up certain cards by using potions)
        - Collect Reagents from monsters in the spire and use them to brew potions or create custom cards.

relics.name: Potion Kit
relics.description: Add an additional Potion slot. Each battle brew a Tonic.
relics.flavorText: The essential tools of the Potion Brewer's trade.

relics.name: Bunsen Burner
relics.description: Brewing a potion takes 2 turns instead of 3.

relics.name: Torch
relics.flavorText: Burns brightly. Goes great with pitchforks.

relics.name: Toy Autogyro
relics.description: Whenever you use a potion, gain 3 Temporary HP.

relics.name: Bottled Elixir
relics.description: Upon pickup, choose a card. The first time you use a potion, draw the chosen card.
relics.flavorText: A strange fluid that attracts matter through time and space.

relics.name: Mortar and Pestle
relics.description: Whenever you discard a potion, heal 5 HP.
relics.flavorText: One of the quintessential tools of an Alchemist.

relics.name: Paper Swan
relics.description: Toxic removes 25% of current HP instead of 20%.
relics.flavorText: An elegant origami of a white bird.

relics.name: Slide Rule
relics.description: When you shuffle your draw pile, deal 5 damage to all enemies.
relics.flavorText: An archaic device of unknown origin.

relics.name: War Medal
relics.description: Every time you play 10 cards, your next attack deals 5 bonus damage.
relics.flavorText: For service to King and Country.

relics.name: Alchemist's Flask
relics.description: Every time you play 25 cards, choose 1 of 3 random potions to use.

relics.name: Drinking Bird
relics.description: At the start of each combat, begin brewing a random potion.
relics.flavorText: An odd contraption that somehow keeps drinking forever.

relics.name: Elric's Monocle
relics.description:
Right Click to use once per battle.
Exhaust your hand and replace each card with an upgraded Colorless card.
relics.flavorText: This curious lens is said to reveal Truth.

relics.name: Alchemist Kit
relics.description: Replaces Potion Kit. Obtain an additional copy of the first potion you use each combat.

relics.name: Bhaskara's Wheel
relics.description: Every 2 turns, shuffle a Reaction into your draw pile.
relics.flavorText: It just keeps turning forever and ever.

relics.name: Booster Pack
relics.description: Add 3 common, 2 uncommon, and 1 rare card to your deck.
relics.flavorText: Add some might to your deck! Guaranteed Rare card in every pack!

relics.name: Keyblade
relics.description: Gain 1 Strength for each key (Emerald, Ruby, and Sapphire) you have collected.

relics.name: Sales Contract
relics.description: Whenever you obtain a (non-tonic) potion, instead receive 20 gold.

keywords.name: Potionbrewer:catalyze
keywords.description: An additional effect that is triggered if you've played a potion this turn.

keywords.name: Potionbrewer:disease
keywords.description: Reduces Damage dealt by half, and spreads Infection to all enemies.

keywords.name: Potionbrewer:infection
keywords.description: Doubles each turn. Applies Disease (damage dealt is reduced by half) when infection is 10 or higher and is reduced by 10.

keywords.name: Potionbrewer:reagent
keywords.description: A potent ingredient collected from one of the Spire's monsters. Can be brewed into a potion, or 3 can be combined into a unique card.

keywords.name: Potionbrewer:slimed
keywords.description: Slimed enemies take 1 additional damage from each attack for each stack of Slimed.

keywords.name: Potionbrewer:tonic
keywords.description: A smaller version of a regular potion that can't be found in shops or rewards.

keywords.name: Potionbrewer:toxic
keywords.description: Lose 20% of current HP at the start of turn.
